definitions.explanation_en: A given name, commonly used as a masculine first name in English-speaking countries, often a diminutive form of Gregory.
definitions.explanation_cn: 一个常见的男性名，多用于英语国家，通常是 Gregory 的缩略形式。
definitions.example_en: Greg is organizing the team meeting this afternoon.
definitions.example_cn: 格雷格今天下午正在组织团队会议。
